actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to authorize the lease and transfer of burley tobacco farm marketing quotas to farms within contiguous countries in the same State.

summary.text: Authorizes the lease and transfer of burley tobacco farm marketing quotas, established under the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938, to other farms in the same county on a pound for pound basis. Allows cross-county leasing if a majority of the burley tobacco producers in the United States approve of such leasing through a referendum. Specifies limitations on such transfers.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the lease and transfer of burley tobacco farm marketing quotas to farms within contiguous countries in the same State.
